author: Bryan Turcotte (BPTWorld)
headerMessage: BPTWorld Apps and Drivers - Always free and available to everyone!
footerMessage:
BPTWorld Apps and Drivers
No walled gardens, No crazy requirements!
Donations are never necessary but always appreciated!

packages.name: Abacus Time Traveler
packages.description: Track how long a Device has been active. Displays Daily, Weekly, Monthly and Yearly Timers!

packages.name: Abacus Counting Machine
packages.description: Count how many times a Device is triggered. Displays Daily, Weekly, Monthly and Yearly counts!
